file.name: exposures_openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'https://exposures.renci.org/v1'
info:
  description: Environmental Exposures API
  version: 0.0.1
  title: Environmental Exposures API
  termsOfService: None
  contact:
    name: Michael J. Stealey
    url: 'https://github.com/renci/nih-exposures-api'
    email: stealey@renci.org
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: 'http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT'
tags:
  - name: environment
  - name: exposure
  - name: query
## deprecate this registry entry?
#   - name: translator
paths:
  /cmaq:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: list of CMAQ exposures
      description: |
        list of CMAQ exposures
        @param 
        - None

        @return 
        - {JSON object} cmaq - returns array of exposure objects available from
      operationId: controllers.default_controller.cmaq_get
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200'
        '400':
          description: Invalid parameter
        '404':
          description: No exposure types found
        '500':
          description: Server error
  /cmaq/getValues:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: get values for exposure type at location for date range
      description: >
        get values for exposure type at location for date range

        @param  - {string} exposureType - unique exposure type in CMAQ

        - {date} startDate - start date of exposure

        - {date} endDate - end date of exposure

        - {string} latLon - latitude, longitude of exposure (multiples to be

        seperated by semicolon ";")

        - {string} - resolution - temporal resolution (hour, day, 7day, 14day),
        default day

        - {string} - aggregation - numerical aggrigation (max, avg), default max

        - {string} - utcOffset - timezone offset from UTC (utc, eastern,
        central, mountain, pacific) - default=utc
          
        @return 

        - {JSON object} values - returns array of exposure values based on date
        range and location
      operationId: controllers.default_controller.cmaq_get_values_get
      parameters:
        - name: exposureType
          in: query
          description: exposure type
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: startDate
          in: query
          description: start date of range
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: endDate
          in: query
          description: end date of range
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: latLon
          in: query
          description: 'latitude,longitude - multiples separated by ;'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: resolution
          in: query
          description: temporal resolution - default=day
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: day
        - name: aggregation
          in: query
          description: numerical aggregation - default=max
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: max
        - name: utcOffset
          in: query
          description: >-
            timezone offset from UTC (utc, eastern, central, mountain, pacific)
            - default=utc
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: utc
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200_1'
        '400':
          description: Invalid parameter
        '404':
          description: No values found
        '500':
          description: Server error
  /cmaq/getScores:
    get:
      tags:
        - default
      summary: get score for exposure type at location for date range
      description: >
        get score for exposure type at location for date range

        @param  - {string} exposureType - unique exposure type in CMAQ

        - {date} startDate - start date of exposure

        - {date} endDate - end date of exposure

        - {string} latLon - latitude, longitude of exposure (multiples to be
        seperated by semicolon ";")

        - {string} - resolution - temporal resolution (hour, day, 7day, 14day),
        default day

        - {string} - aggregation - numerical aggrigation (max, avg), default max

        - {string} - utcOffset - timezone offset from UTC (utc, eastern,
        central, mountain, pacific) - default=utc


        @return 

        - {JSON object} scores - returns array of exposure scores based on date
        range and location
      operationId: controllers.default_controller.cmaq_get_scores_get
      parameters:
        - name: exposureType
          in: query
          description: exposure type
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: startDate
          in: query
          description: start date of range
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: endDate
          in: query
          description: end date of range
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: latLon
          in: query
          description: 'latitude,longitude - multiples separated by ;'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: resolution
          in: query
          description: temporal resolution - default=day
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: day
        - name: aggregation
          in: query
          description: numerical aggregation - default=max
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: max
        - name: utcOffset
          in: query
          description: >-
            timezone offset from UTC (utc, eastern, central, mountain, pacific)
            - default=utc
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: utc
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200_2'
        '400':
          description: Invalid parameter
        '404':
          description: No scores found
        '500':
          description: Server error
components:
  schemas:
    inline_response_200_2_scores:
      properties:
        score:
          type: string
        dateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        latLon:
          type: string
      type: object
    inline_response_200_1_values:
      properties:
        value:
          type: string
        dateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        latLon:
          type: string
      type: object
    inline_response_200_1:
      properties:
        values:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200_1_values'
      type: object
    inline_response_200:
      properties:
        cmaq:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200_cmaq'
      type: object
    inline_response_200_2:
      properties:
        scores:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200_2_scores'
      type: object
    inline_response_200_cmaq:
      properties:
        exposureType:
          type: string
        exposureUnit:
          type: string
        startDate:
          type: string
          format: date
        endDate:
          type: string
          format: date
        resolution:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        aggregation:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      type: object
  parameters:
    cmaq_exposureType:
      name: exposureType
      in: query
      description: exposure type
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    cmaq_startDate:
      name: startDate
      in: query
      description: start date of range
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        format: date
    cmaq_endDate:
      name: endDate
      in: query
      description: end date of range
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        format: date
    cmaq_latLon:
      name: latLon
      in: query
      description: 'latitude,longitude - multiples separated by ;'
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
    cmaq_resolution:
      name: resolution
      in: query
      description: temporal resolution - default=day
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        default: day
    cmaq_aggregation:
      name: aggregation
      in: query
      description: numerical aggregation - default=max
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        default: max
    cmaq_utcOffset:
      name: utcOffset
      in: query
      description: >-
        timezone offset from UTC (utc, eastern, central, mountain, pacific) -
        default=utc
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        default: utc
